#summary How to contact BWAPI developers

This page contains contact information for submitting or discussing issues, suggestions, comments, joining the project, and any other BWAPI topics.

To contact us you simply have to do one of the following:

  * Visit the [http://webchat.freenode.net/?channels=BWAPI IRC channel], which can be found on [http://freenode.net/irc_servers.shtml freenode]#BWAPI.
  * Post on the [http://www.broodwarai.com/forums/index.php?showforum=46 BroodwarAI forum]
  * Create an [http://code.google.com/p/bwapi/issues/list issue]
  * Post on the [http://groups.google.com/group/bwapi BWAPI group]
  * Send us an email at deathknight13579 (at) aim (dot) com, or lowerlogic (at) gmail (dot) com with BWAPI in the subject
